definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
synoptic gospels (i.e. Matthew, Mark and Luke, with similar accounts and chronology)

sentences.english: This is the day of salvation, calling sinners to repent and believe the gospel.
sentences.chinese: 這是拯救的時代，呼召罪人悔改，相信福音。

sentences.english: He also insinuates that the oral tradition from which the Gospels originated was flawed.
sentences.chinese: 他還暗示，福音書因爲口口相傳是有缺陷的。

sentences.english: It delivers tax relief for families and businesses.
sentences.chinese: 它爲家庭和企業帶來稅收減負的福音。

sentences.english: And Luke recorded that in his gospel.
sentences.chinese: 而路加在他的福音裏記載了這點。

sentences.english: This story in John 3 is not the whole story about Nicodemus.
sentences.chinese: 約翰福音第3章並非尼哥底母故事的全部。

sentences.english: The fulness of the gospel, including all temple ordinances, is then available to us.
sentences.chinese: 豐滿的福音，包括所有的聖殿教儀，已經賜與我們。

sentences.english: God has ordained that people be reconciled to him through the preachingof the gospel by Christians.
sentences.chinese: 神命定人們通過基督徒向他們傳福音與他和好。

sentences.english: It contains the whole gospel and the essence of the covenant of grace. It has been in great measure fulfilled.
sentences.chinese: 應許中涵蓋了全本的福音，也蘊藏著恩典之約的精髓。

sentences.english: The Gospel is clear on that, too. Woe to you on whom the evil demons act.
sentences.chinese: 福音書上很清楚，對那些被魔鬼附身的表述悲哀吧。

sentences.english: And Luke correctly passed on Paul's gospel.
sentences.chinese: 而路加如實傳播了保羅的福音。

sentences.english: It said "From the star keeper to The Gospel Church".
sentences.chinese: 信封上寫着“發自星星燈守護人，寫給福音教堂。”

sentences.english: Now we have the Gospel of Judas.
sentences.chinese: 現在又加上了一部《猶大福音》。

sentences.english: The school is financed by American and South Korean evangelical Christians.
sentences.chinese: 學校的資金由美國和南朝鮮福音派教會提供。

sentences.english: And then you get to the birth narratives in Matthew, the stories of the Baby Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 然後你讀到了馬太福音中，記敘耶穌誕生的故事。

sentences.english: 18And with many other words John exhorted the people and preached the good news to them.
sentences.chinese: 約翰又用許多別的話勸百姓，向他們傳福音。

sentences.english: The angel told the evangelist's evangel to a gang of fanged gangling gangsters.
sentences.chinese: 天使把福音傳道者的佳音傳給一夥有毒牙的瘦長匪徒。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
